titleStmt.title: Churchyards good will Sad and heauy verses, in the nature of an epitaph, for the losse of the Archbishop of Canterbury, lately deceased, Primate and Metropolitane of all England. Written by Thomas Churchyard, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling in Hosier lane, neere Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: The Archbishop of Canterbury = John Whitgift.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
